languages.text:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Все цели в радиусе 1 клетки от эпицентра взрыва получают <u>(от 20 до 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 45%.
Цели, которым не удалось {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от этой гранаты, также получают 30 психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Deals 10 Piercing damage with 20 armour penetration within the area.
If a target has suffered at least 1 damage from this grenade, it also suffer 12 mental damage.

Deals 10 piercing damage within the area. This attack has 20 armour penetration
If a target has suffered at least 1 damage from this grenade, it also suffers 12 mental damage.

Deals 10 piercing damage within the area. This attack has 20 armour penetration
If a target has suffered at least 1 damage from this grenade, it also suffers 12 mental damage.

languages.text:
Все цели в радиусе 1 клетки от эпицентра взрыва получают <u>(от 20 до 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}пронзающего урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 45%.
Цели, которым не удалось {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от этой гранаты, также получают 30 психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Deals 10 piercing damage within the area. This attack has 20 armour penetration
If a target has suffered at least 1 damage from this grenade, it also suffers 12 mental damage.

traits.locale_text:
Наносит 10 пронзающего урона по области. Пробитие брони составляет 20%.
Получив хотя бы 1 урон от взрыва гранаты, цель также получает 12 психического урона.

Наносит 10 пронзающего урона по области. Пробитие брони составляет 20%.
Получив хотя бы 1 урон от взрыва гранаты, цель также получает 12 психического урона.

languages.text:
对目标区域1格内的所有敌人造成<u>20-40</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}，此次攻击获得45%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
如果目标未能{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}手雷的攻击，还会额外承受30点精神{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
对目标区域造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}穿刺伤害{/g}。此次攻击获得20点{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
如果手雷对目标至少造成了1点伤害，则还会额外造成12点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text:
Todos los objetivos en un radio de 1 casilla del epicentro de la explosión sufren <u>de 20 a 40</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g} con 45 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
Si el objetivo no {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} la granada, también sufre 30 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} mental.
languages.original_text:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Inflige 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}daño perforante{/g} en el área. Este ataque tiene 20 de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
Si el objetivo sufre al menos 1 punto de daño de esta granada, sufre 12 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.

languages.text:
爆発が起こった場所から半径1マス以内にいる全てのターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}45%の<u>20～40の</u>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
ターゲットがこのグレネードを{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}しなかった場合、30の精神的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}も受ける。
languages.original_text:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
範囲内に10の{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}貫通ダメージ{/g}を与える。この攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}は20。
ターゲットがこのグレネードで1以上のダメージを受けた場合、さらに12の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text:
Alle Ziele in einem 1-Feld-Radius um das Epizentrum der Explosion erleiden <u>20 bis 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g} mit 45 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
Wenn das Ziel dieser Granate nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, erleidet es zudem 30 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Fügt 10 {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Durchdringungsschaden{/g} im Bereich zu. Dieser Angriff hat 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}
Hat ein Ziel mindestens 1 Schaden durch diese Granate erlitten, nimmt es auch 12 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

languages.text:
Toutes les cibles dans un rayon de 1 case autour de l'épicentre de l'explosion subissent <u>20 à 40</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perçants{/g}, avec 45 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
Si la cible n'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pas cette grenade, elle subit également 30 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} mentaux.
languages.original_text:
All targets in a 1-cell radius of the epicentre of the explosion suffer <u>from 20 to 40</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g}, with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target does not {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} this grenade, they also suffer 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Inflige 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}dégâts perçants{/g} dans la zone. Cette attaque s'accompagne de 20 de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
Si cette grenade inflige au moins 1 point de dégâts à une cible, cette dernière subit également 12 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.
